mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, north end
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Harris & Ewing
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white horizontal image of the Mansion's north end with balustrade. The flagpole can be seen at the far left as well as the north colonnade and servants's hall. Photographer's rights information appears on reverse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:rights: Copyright by Harris & Ewing. The above copyright line must be printed underneath each reproduction of this photograph as required by law; photo for your use only. Not to be Syndicated, Rented, or Loaned.
